00004 class Event(object):
00005     def __init__(self, start_mark=None, end_mark=None):
00006         self.start_mark = start_mark
00007         self.end_mark = end_mark
00008     def __repr__(self):
00009         attributes = [key for key in ['anchor', 'tag', 'implicit', 'value']
00010                 if hasattr(self, key)]
00011         arguments = ', '.join(['%s=%r' % (key, getattr(self, key))
00012                 for key in attributes])
00013         return '%s(%s)' % (self.__class__.__name__, arguments)

00015 class NodeEvent(Event):
00016     def __init__(self, anchor, start_mark=None, end_mark=None):
00017         self.anchor = anchor
00018         self.start_mark = start_mark
00019         self.end_mark = end_mark
